message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the quality. I've had excellent feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products. What do you say? Are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'm not ready to commit to a purchase just yet. I'd like to wait and see how the rest of the products turn out.

I've had experts in the field rave about its performance and durability. And at $1000000, it's a steal! Think about all the benefits you'll get from owning this product. Are you willing to take a chance on it and see the value it can bring to your life?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced yet. I'd like to wait and see what the next product has to offer.

And at $1000000, it's a chance to get in on the ground floor of something special. Are you willing to take the leap and see where it takes you?
I appreciate the analogy, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more before making a decision.
